long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AutoSuite is an efficiency app built to make your everyday office life easier. We’re aiming to build a suite of tools that can help you save a few minutes in your day while providing value to what you’re doing. Here are a few examples of our efficiency tools:

💻 HyperCut: Do you find yourself creating hyperlinks in your emails too frequently? Want to hyperlink that Help Article or your coworker’s LinkedIn URL without finding that URL first? Set your individual or company-wide “HyperCuts” and defined phrases will automatically get hyperlinked!

📆 ScheduleLink: Tired of having to find times between multiple parties to meet next? Create a unique URL that allows the necessary members to “Authorize Calendar Availability” and have one central place to find and book your next meeting.
